Professions: sales manager, operations manager, lead generator
description: Exploit price differences or credit ratios between services to optimize costs and maximize value
typical_use_cases: Optimize lead source selection by cost/quality ratio

arbitrage_examples.description: Search 1 company in Airscale (1 credit) → Get up to 40 decision-maker domains → Feed to Anymailfinder (40 × $0.0025 = $0.10)
Compare: LinkedIn Navigator ($99/mo unlimited) vs Bright Data ($0.0025/lead) vs Instantly.ai (4,500 included)
arbitrage_examples.decision: Choose based on volume needs and budget

workflows: Identify target companies → Use Airscale enterprise arbitrage → Maximize emails per credit
Compare enrichment costs → Select optimal service → Execute arbitrage strategy
cost_optimization_note: Critical for high-volume lead generation to minimize per-lead costs
